name: MiniCADS
short_description:
MiniCADS v13.0 is a very tiny application for the users that need to quickly browse R14-2012 DWG file without AutoCAD. 
The program provides you with the basic tools such as pan, zoom, print, length, area, annotation and conversion.
Amazingly, it can automatically load losing fonts of the opening DWG file.
You can quickly get the DWG file according to the browsed records and marked records.;   
You can also export your DWG file to PDF or JPG etc.
summary: A very tiny application for the users that need to quickly browse DWG
